tips.firstTimePrompt: Since you haven't released a version yet, an initial release is required.
tips.failedToIncrement: Failed to increment the version number
tips.invalidVersionField: The version field in package.json is missing or invalid
tips.enterInitialVersion: Please enter your initial version number, default is 0.0.1:
tips.error: Please enter a valid semantic version number, for example: v{0}

main.prompt: What would you like to do

upgrade.prompt: Which version would you like to upgrade
upgrade.confirmPush: Do you want to push the version to the repository

specificVersion.confirm: Your current version is: v{0}. Confirm setting to specified version: v{1}

revoke.prompt: Which version would you like to revoke

revokeCurrentVersion.prompt: Retain changes to files, only revoke the version number

revokeSpecificVersion.prompt: Please enter the version number to revoke:
revokeSpecificVersion.retainChanges: Retain changes to files, only revoke the version number
revokeSpecificVersion.confirm: Your current version is: v{0}. Confirm revoking: v{1}

revertToPreviousVersion.updatePackageJson: Do you want to update the version number in package.json from v{0} to the revoked version v{1}
revertToPreviousVersion.failedToRetrieve: Failed to retrieve the version number from previous commits. The version number in package.json has not been temporarily modified. Please modify manually if needed.
